channel.title: CVE Feed for Esri -- Portal for ArcGIS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Esri -- Portal for ArcGIS

item.title: CVE-2022-38186|2024-09-17T00:46:11.084Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is a reflected XSS vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 10.8.1 and below which may allow a remote attacker able to convince a user to click on a crafted link which could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser.

item.title: CVE-2022-38193|2024-09-17T00:26:51.619Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is a code injection vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 10.8.1 and below that may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to pass strings which could potentially cause arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-38192|2024-09-17T00:16:28.551Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: A stored Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to pass and store malicious strings via crafted queries which when accessed could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the user’s browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-25693|2024-07-31T20:00:27.790Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is a path traversal in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions <= 11.2. Successful exploitation may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to traverse the file system to access files or execute code outside of the intended directory.

item.title: CVE-2024-25692|2024-04-19T22:28:02.403Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is a cross-site-request forgery vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS Versions 11.1 and below that may in some cases allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to trick an authorized user into executing unwanted actions via a crafted form. The impact to Confidentiality and Integrity vectors is limited and of low severity.

item.title: CVE-2024-25693|2024-04-19T22:30:03.677Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is a path traversal in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions <= 11.2. Successful exploitation may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to traverse the file system to access files or execute code outside of the intended directory.

item.title: CVE-2024-25692|2024-07-05T17:21:28.537Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis
item.description: There is a cross-site-request forgery vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS Versions 11.1 and below that may in some cases allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to trick an authorized user into executing unwanted actions via a crafted form. The impact to Confidentiality and Integrity vectors is limited and of low severity.
